body:
Comment 3: 
IMO the specs are just fine in this. It might be a bit more precise to add `()` to all
the method examples to emphasize it must by called (it really must, so it's implied
[http://play.golang.org/p/5e6SeZgRLJ] and no, Mx is not/cannot be accessed per the same
code).

It is IMO not strictly necessary to change, but it cannot hurt anyone.
